jcr:content.jcr:description: Scaffolding Used to create Product Data for Havells.

brochure.fieldDescription: Provide a path to the product brochure
brochure.name: ./productBrochure

recommendation.fieldDescription: Click '+' to add Product page paths which belongs to similar category or subcategory

warranty.fieldDescription: Click '+' to add Warranty Label and Period

imagepaths.fieldDescription: Click '+' to add Technical Specification Image Paths

videoPaths.fieldDescription: Click '+' to add Youtube Videos' absolute path(Eg. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=video-Id)
